description: AnrFunctionGeran:  Table storing GERAN ANR function configuration and measurement reporting parameters for different cells at a specific time.  Columns: dateTime (timestamp), Area_Name (area name), CellId (cell identifier), Id2 (duplicate cell identifier), Id3 (unknown identifier), Id4 (unknown identifier), vsDataType (data type identifier), vsDataFormatVersion (data format version), AnrFunctionGeran.anrFunctionGeranId (ANR function ID), AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportRacIncr (RAC measurement report increment), AnrFunctionGeran.rimIntegrationEnabled (RIM integration enabled flag), AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportIncr (GERAN measurement report increment), AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportDecr (GERAN measurement report decrement), AnrFunctionGeran.problematicCellPolicy (policy for problematic cells), AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportMin (minimum GERAN measurement report), AnrFunctionGeran.anrStateGsm (GSM ANR state), AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportMax (maximum GERAN measurement report), AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranRacMeasOn (RAC measurement enabled flag).
queries: Show me all AnrFunctionGeran records for Area_Name 'Downtown' where AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportRacIncr is greater than 10.
What is the average AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportIncr for CellId 1234 between 2024-03-08 00:00:00 and 2024-03-08 23:59:59?
Retrieve AnrFunctionGeran.anrStateGsm for all cells with AnrFunctionGeran.rimIntegrationEnabled = false.
Find all instances where AnrFunctionGeran.anrGeranMeasReportMin is less than 5 and AnrFunctionGeran.problematicCellPolicy is 'Restrict'.
How many unique CellId values exist in AnrFunctionGeran for vsDataType 'TypeA' and vsDataFormatVersion 'V1'?
